outline:
1. to murder, slay, kill
    1. (Qal) to murder, slay
      1. premeditated
      2. accidental
      3. as avenger
      4. slayer (intentional) (participle)
    2. (Niphal) to be slain
    3. (Piel)
      1. to murder, assassinate
      2. murderer, assassin (participle)(subst)
    4. (Pual) to be killed
kjv_def: put to death, kill, (man-) slay(-er), murder(-er).
strongs_def: properly, to dash in pieces, i.e. kill (a human being), especially to murder
